item.title: U.K. grads are earning 30% less out of college than they did in 2007—research finds the pay premium for Gen Z isn’t what it was for millennials
item.description: The promise of a high-paying graduate job is slipping away for Gen Z as pay premiums plummet by half in the U.K.

item.title: Exclusive: Former Citadel employees raise $17 million for Fin, a global stablecoin app ‘without all the complexity’
item.description: The startup aims to allow businesses to conduct big cross-border transactions in cheap and rapid fashion.

item.title: L’Oreal CHRO cut her teeth at luxury brands Chanel and Kiehl’s—like Walmart’s CEO she says the secret to her success was always saying yes
item.description: Like Walmart’s CEO, L’Oreal exec says the the secret to her success was always saying yes—to grabbing coffee, taking notes, moving abroad

item.title: Fund managers from diverse backgrounds are delivering standout returns and the smart money is slowly starting to pay attention
item.description: Since 2016, we’ve invested through diverse fund managers, seeing steady, market-rate performance. An entrenched "old-boy" network keeps us in the mino...

item.title: China does not need Nvidia chips in the AI war — export controls only pushed it to build its own AI machine
item.description: If the U.S. wants to lead in AI, chip controls are not the answer.
